translations: 悬于……之上（overhang 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.sentence: His big fat belly overhung his belt.
sentences.translation: 他那硕大肥胖的肚子挺在腰带上面。

sentences.sentence: Part of the rock wall overhung the path at one point.
sentences.translation: 部分岩壁悬在了小径一处的上方。

sentences.sentence: His balcony overhung a large cage.
sentences.translation: 他的阳台下面悬挂着一只大鸟笼。
